name: HOME PLATE FOOD GROUP
description: Advocacy group to end obesity in America and around the world.
sampleDescriptions: Assist Home Plate Food Group expand its current food and nutrition program to include a full scale effort designed to help senior nutrition programs nationwide feed more senior adults.
